phrases.phrase: Reacts to an update to your product
Your license is about to expire
Creates a product in a watched category
Your license does not permit you to download this version.
No downloadable version could be found matching your filters.
You have not purchased any licenses yet.
Covers viewing eCommerce categories or the list of categories.
Covers updating or creating a product category.
Covers creating and soft-deleting product ratings/reviews.
DragonByte eCommerce: Record daily income statistics
Your access to this license has expired.
Add-on products are listed, but not included in the totals
If your business address has a c/o ("care of") name, you can add it here.
The name of your business, or your own name if you do not have a registered business. This will appear on your invoice.
You or your business' resident country. The native name of the country will be printed on the invoice.
A friendly name used to identify the address on the checkout screen. For example, "Home" or "Work".
The administrator must create at least one shipping zone before you can continue.
If no categories are explicitly selected, this widget will pull from all categories unless used within a product category. In this case, the products will be limited to that category and descendents.
All selected products are already in the destination category. Please select another category.
Also send an email immediately after saving

If the option to immediately send an alert is selected, an email will be queued directly after saving this sale, informing users when the sale will start and the details of the sale as chosen below.
Please note that this option will not be available when editing a sale, to avoid the possibility of accidentally spamming members. If you delete the sale or turn off the above option during edit, this alert will be cancelled and you will not be able to send another immediate alert.
Always moderate product updates posted in this category
Always moderate products posted in this category
Always show coupon discounts in sub-total
Whether to always display "Coupon discounts" in the sub-total, even if no coupons are applied.
Always show sale discounts in sub-total
Whether to always display "Sale discounts" in the sub-total, even if no sale discounts are applied.
An invoice for your purchase has been attached to this email.
Automatically apply a coupon that lasts
The products you have selected are located in more than one category. Each product will only be updated if the chosen prefix is valid in its category.
Are you sure you want to remove this product from your cart?
Automatically create news thread in forum
Automatically create purchase thread in forum
Automatically post in the content thread on content deletion
You can choose to make this product appear in one or more filtering options via this setting.
These are the zones this product will ship to. The available countries and shipping methods are determined by the shipping zone. The cost of shipping is determined by the shipping method.
This address will be used for your invoice, which will be automatically sent to you.

The country of your billing address does not appear to match the country you are currently in. Unfortunately, due to regulations this means your VAT number cannot be applied to this order.

We apologise for the inconvenience.

The country of your billing address does not appear to match the country you are currently in. Unfortunately, due to regulations this means your order cannot be processed. Please change your billing address.

We apologise for the inconvenience.

The country of your billing address does not appear to match the country of your VAT number. Unfortunately, due to regulations this means your VAT number cannot be applied to this order.

We apologise for the inconvenience.
Cancelling this order will also delete any associated licenses.
You cannot create nested add-on products.
You cannot delete this pricing tier as there is one or more pending orders making use of it.
Unfortunately this download is currently unavailable. Sorry!
Please accept the refund policy before continuing.
Please accept the Terms of Service before continuing.
You cannot renew the same license twice in the same transaction.
You can not update your rating or review once the author has responded.

Choose the product and commission for that product, either as a percentage or a flat value.
Set product to "None" to remove a row upon saving.
Any internal notes that will help clarify discrepancies in payments, etc.
The user name of the user who should be logged as the executor of the commission payments.
If the recipient has a forum account, you can enter their user name here.
Commissions allow you to keep track of payments owed to employees or sub-contractors that receive a portion of sales for products.
Completing this order will grant the user products without requiring payment.
Confirm action: Retry payment for Order #{orderId}

You can either enter a flat amount (in {currency}, without the currency symbol) to be charged per item shipped using this shipping method, or you can use a formula.
You can tie separate shipping methods to separate shipping zones.

Replacement variables:
  • q - the total number of items being shipped using this shipping method for any given order
  • c - total cost of all items being shipped using this shipping method (in {currency}, without the currency symbol) for any given order
  • w - total weight (in {unit}) of all items being shipped using this shipping method for any given order
Could not execute WkHtmlToPdf at the path specified.
Either the coupon has expired, or the coupon code was invalid.
Could not find WkHtmlToPdf at the path specified.
A server error occurred during country validation. Please contact the administrator for assistance.
If not enabled, products where this coupon is applied is not susceptible to automatic discounts.
This order already has a coupon added to it.

Leaving the value field blank will use the "Coupon type" value chosen above.
Set product to "None" to remove a row upon saving.
If no products are chosen, this coupon applies to all products.
If you have a coupon code, you can apply it here. It will automatically discount the relevant items.
The chosen coupon could not be applied. Either your cart does not meet the requirements, or you do not have permission to use this coupon.
If enabled, the discount provided by this coupon will not count towards the user's maximum discount.
Enter an IP address to see a list of all coupon usages logged as having originated from that IP. You may enter a partial IP address such as 192.168.*, 192.168.0.0/16, or 2001:db8::/32.
The minimum total value of the products in the cart (in {currency}) before this coupon can be applied.
The minimum amount of products the customer needs to have in their cart before this coupon can be applied.

This setting determines how many uses this coupon has remaining before it is no longer available for use.
-1 = Unlimited uses
Determines what sort of discount is applied to the customer's cart; a percent off their total, or a set discount.
Coupons are currently globally disabled. You cannot add or edit coupons, and any current coupons will not apply.
Deleting this order will prevent payment from being taken.

Deleting this address will remove it from {count} orders, which can make accounting for previous sales more difficult. This action cannot be undone. Please tick the box below to confirm you really wish to do this.
Deleting this license renders the user unable to download this product until a new license is purchased or this license is undeleted/re-added.
Deleting this product will also delete the {count} download(s) belonging to this product.
Deleting this product will also delete {count} licenses belonging to this product. This action cannot be undone. Please tick the box below to confirm you really wish to do this.

Deleting this shipping method will also reset {count} order items using this shipping method to "Unselected". This action cannot be undone. Please tick the box below to confirm you really wish to do this.

Deleting this shipping zone will also reset {count} order items using this shipping zone to "Unselected". This action cannot be undone. Please tick the box below to confirm you really wish to do this.
The percent the customer's cart will be discounted by.
This is the minimum amount (in {currency}) a customer's cart needs to contain in order for this discount to apply.
Categories chosen here do NOT affect permissions. This option is for display and sorting purposes only.

Choose the product and the number of licenses they should be able to generate.
Set product to "None" to remove a row upon saving.
Set the value field to -1 to allow unlimited licenses to be generated for this product.
Distributors can generate licenses for products they have been assigned.
You do not currently have the All-Access Pass.
This will be displayed on the product information page.
This download is not available. Please try another.
Enter an IP address to see a list of all downloads logged as having originated from that IP. You may enter a partial IP address such as 192.168.*, 192.168.0.0/16, or 2001:db8::/32.

If the product specifies an update notification forum, a thread will automatically be created containing the Change log specified above. This field can contain additional marketing-friendly text, and will be included above the change log in the release thread.
If left blank, this download will not generate a release thread or post.

You can specify one or more locations for the demo (Lite) version of this download to generate itself from.
It is recommended these locations are outside of your web-accessible folder and are readable.

You can specify one or more locations for this download to generate itself from.
It is recommended these locations are outside of your web-accessible folder and are readable.

Seperate multiple repositories by a new line, for example:
/home/downloads/1
/home/downloads/2
This version has no directories to read from.
This version has no URL to redirect to.
Enable global default sales tax, for this amount
This setting uses the Navigation Manager's position.
This will enable a navbar tab on the right hand side (where the "Alert" and "Inbox" tabs are).

If you need to charge VAT on purchases from EU countries, you can enable it here.
VAT rates will be kept up to date automatically.

If this option is enabled, the user's current IP address will be compared to the country they chose in their billing address.
The VAT number will be rejected if the countries do not match. This may result in false positives and reduced performance when validating VAT numbers.
Explain why you're giving this rating. Reviews which are not constructive may be removed without notice.

Set product to "None" to skip a row upon saving.
If no products are chosen, the extension applies to all products.
You can provide a list of all the features in this product. This will be displayed in a separate tab on the product information page.
The following placeholders will be replaced in the message: {productId}, {product}, {name}, {email}, {id}.
This will be displayed in the product overview pane.
A full size view, displaying as a standard product list (using the style preference for grid view vs list view).
A full size view, displaying as a standard product list (using grid view).
A full size view, displaying as a standard product list (using list view).
Countries that do not have a sales tax rate explicitly set will use this value.
Determines whether this product has a demo (Lite) version available.
The highlighted option will be shown in emphasised font, and will display a "Most value!" label. It will also be the default selected option.
I understand that after downloading this product I cannot cancel/refund.
I have read and agree to the Terms of Service
I have read the above warning, cancel the order.
I have read the above warning, complete the order.
I have read the warning and I wish to delete {count} license(s)
I have read the warning and I wish to reset {count} order(s)
I have read the above warning, restore the order.
I understand the above warning, I want to retry payment
If entered, the VAT validation system will use a hosted service for enhanced reliability. Click here then click "Get Free API Access" and fill out the form to be given an API key.
If selected, a "Get support" button will be shown on the product information page that directs users to this forum.
If selected, only staff will be able to see who wrote this review.
If selected, a post will be made automatically on the creator's behalf explaining that the content is no longer available.
If selected, whenever a new product is released, a thread will be posted in this forum.

If selected, whenever someone purchases this product, a thread will be posted in this forum.
Only applies if one or more product fields are selected in the above option.
If selected, users will only be able to use this coupon if they are explicitly granted permissions.
If selected, users will only be able to view this product if they are explicitly granted permissions.
If selected, users will be required to select a prefix when creating or editing a product. This will not be enforced for moderators.
Enter the full path to the folder containing your vBeCommerce product icons. If this can not be found or read, you can clear this path completely to skip importing product icons.
Enter the user name of the user that should own imported products.
Enter the full path to the folder containing your vBeCommerce product screenshots. If this can not be found or read, you can clear this path completely to skip importing product screenshots.
Include sales tax in order total sent to the payment processor

If your payment processor handles sales tax on their end (such as PayPal), you may wish to let it handle adding any tax. This may be required to import your transactions into accounting software such as QuickBooks.
Select the countries you wish to ship to using this shipping zone.

Only the shipping methods selected here will be available for this shipping zone.
Cost is determined by the shipping method, so if you need to charge more for this shipping zone, you can create a new shipping method and select it here.
One or more of your chosen add-ons is invalid for the chosen product, or you do not have permission to purchase it.

The VAT number you have entered appears to be invalid.

Please make sure you are entering it correctly, and that you are including the country code.
If selected, this product is part of the "All Access" feature, and users who are members of the required user group(s) can create a license for it.

If no, this product's price cannot be reduced via automatic discounts.
Coupons and sales may still be created for this product regardless of this setting.
Featured products appear first in the list of products, and get a separate banner indicating it's featured.
If this setting is un-ticked, this product will not appear in the product list on the main page or in the category view.
This is set automatically when you record a payment. This field should not be altered unless you are sure you need to, as it may cause commissions to be granted twice for the same purchase.

Your license expired {expired} and the latest version was released {released}.
If you want to download the latest version, please renew your license.
You are restricted from being able to create a license that expires this far into the future.
The length determines how long the user will receive updates for this product if they choose to purchase the product at that pricing tier.
String to uniquely identify this product and will prefix the customer's unique licence number.
License prefixes must be unique. The specified prefix is already in use.
The license {title} was reassigned to you.
You may not delete addresses that have been used in one or more orders, as this would disrupt record keeping. Please contact the administrators for assistance.
You may not edit addresses that have been used in one or more orders.
You cannot edit a verified address.
Required license information is missing. Please edit the license and fill out the required information before downloading.
These moderation options apply to the front-end only.
Multiple requirements may be separated by commas.
You need to confirm you wish to delete {count} license(s) before you can delete this product.
The new icon could not be applied. Please try again later.
The new license owner must be able to view the product this license belongs to.
The new owner must be able to view this product.
The new product discussion thread must be a standard discussion thread.

Hello {name}!

Just thought we would let you know; the sale {sale_title} is scheduled to start {sale_start}, and will run until {sale_end}!

Hello {name}!

Just thought we would let you know; the sale {sale_title} has just started, and will run until {sale_end}!

{sale_description}

The following products are on sale: {sale_products}

If disabled, orders consisting only of free products will not require an address.
The update duration may not be relevant to add-on products; the duration is usually tied to the parent product.
This order has already been completed.
These fields can be associated with specific products and will appear on the checkout screen.
This order has already been shipped.
This order is not yet complete. You cannot ship an order until it's been paid for.
Enter an IP address to see a list of all orders logged as having originated from that IP. You may enter a partial IP address such as 192.168.*, 192.168.0.0/16, or 2001:db8::/32.
Add-on product licenses must be assigned to a valid parent license.
The path provided was not valid.
Please choose at least one license to renew.
Please choose a country from the list of options.
Please choose a shipping address before choosing a shipping method.

Please choose a valid parent license

Please confirm that you want to ship the following

Please create at least one country before continuing.

Please enter your name or the name of your business.

Please enter a valid license prefix
Please enter a valid product ID
Please perform this service A.S.A.P. You may also wish to reply to this email to let the user know when you will be performing the service, or to discuss details.
Please provide a review with your rating.
Please select a valid parent category. A category may not be a child of itself or one of its descendants.
Please select a valid parent product.
Please ship this item as soon as possible. You may also wish to reply to this email to let the user know the item has shipped, along with the tracking number (if applicable).
Please update the license info for the parent license
Please click here to update the license info for the parent license.
This is the category that will be used to determine permissions, as well as breadcrumbs on the product information page.
Puts the user in the selected groups after purchasing the product.
The user group(s) someone will have to be a member of in order to generate a license under the "All Access" feature.
* Starred fields are required for new products when purchased. Other fields are optional.
If this product has any copyright information and/or visible branding, you can disclose that here.
This product has no demo version to download.
You can provide a list of all the specifications of this product. This will be displayed in a separate tab on the product information page.
A short blob (around 140 characters) that briefly explains the product. This will be displayed in the product list.
Puts the user in the selected groups after purchasing the product, but removes the selected groups when the license expires.

A new product by {username} is available: [url={product_link}][plain]{title}[/plain][/url] - [plain]{tag_line}[/plain]

When an update to an existing product is released, the system can either start a new thread or reply to the parent product's thread.
The product {title} was reassigned to you.
Number of products in cart between
Your serial key for {item} is shown below.
{purchaser} provided additional information with this order. You can find this information here: {thread}
Use negative values to find reversed / refunded orders.
Enter an IP address to see a list of all purchases logged as having originated from that IP. You may enter a partial IP address such as 192.168.*, 192.168.0.0/16, or 2001:db8::/32.
Rejected addresses will not be deleted, but will have their VAT IDs removed. The reason for rejection, if entered here, will be displayed in the alert given to the user.

Hello {name}!

Just thought we would remind you that you have {numLicenses} license(s) expiring soon at {boardTitle}.

The following license(s) are expiring soon: {licenses}

Click here to renew all expired / expiring licenses.

Click here to see all your licenses.

Unsubscribe from emails regarding your expiring licenses

Hello {name}!

Just thought we would remind you that you've yet to complete your order #{orderId} at {boardTitle}.

Click here to complete checkout.

Unsubscribe from emails regarding your pending orders

Hello {name}!

Just thought we would remind you that you've yet to complete your order #{orderId} at {boardTitle}.

We have applied a coupon to your order for {coupon_discount} off all products in your cart. This coupon only applies to products currently in your cart, and will be valid until {coupon_expiry}.

Click here to complete checkout.

Unsubscribe from emails regarding your pending orders
This will use the "License renewal discount" or "Expired license renewal discount" options set in the XenForo options.
The requested address was not found.
The requested download could not be found.
The requested license was not found.
The requested product could not be found.
The requested review could not be found.

If disabled, customers will not be asked for their address during checkout. Address is always required in the following circumstances:
· The order contains a physical product
· Sales tax is enabled, and the order total is greater than 0
Restoring this order will also restore any associated licenses.

Retrying payment should only be done if payment failed, or if you never completed payment in the first place. If you have already submitted payment, but it has not cleared yet, please do not continue.
If not enabled, products where this sale is applied is not susceptible to automatic discounts.

Leaving the value field blank will use the "Sale type" value chosen above.
Set product to "None" to remove a row upon saving.
If no products are chosen, this sale applies to all products.
If enabled, the discount provided by this sale will not count towards the user's maximum discount.

This will bump the product(s) to the top of the list during this sale.
Note that this overrides any manual "Featured" toggle in the product(s), they will be automatically un-featured at the end of this sale.
This will automatically reset the sale at the specified interval.

If your sale cannot be set to recur at regular intervals, you can set your own custom dates here.
Any invalid date ranges (e.g. end date before start date) will be silently discarded.

Note: Adding any dates here will disable the "recurring" feature, if enabled.
Determines what sort of discount is applied to the customer's cart; a percent off the product(s) on sale, or a set discount.
Sales are currently globally disabled. You cannot add or edit sales, and any current sales will not apply.

The above settings control how sales tax should be calculated. Buyer's country calculates tax based on the tax rate of the country entered during checkout. Seller's country calculates tax based on the tax rate of the country you chose in the business settings.

If you have a sales tax ID and would like it to appear on your invoices, you can enter it here.
We are not registered for EU VAT, as we are located in {country}.

Enter the sales tax rate that should be added to the chosen country. Existing rates will be overwritten.
Enter -1.000 to revert to the global rate.
The selected pricing tier is invalid. Please go back and try again.
The selected product variation only has {available} items available.
The selected product variation is out of stock.
Send an email when the sale starts
This option will send an email to anyone who purchases the product. You can define the email below.

The following replacement variables are available:
  • {d} - a number from 0-9
  • {w} - a lowercase letter from a-z
  • {W} - an uppercase letter from A-Z
Example: {d}{W}{d}{W}{d}-{d}{W}{d}{W}{d}-{d}{d}{d}{W}{W}-{W}{W}{W}{d}{d}-{W}{d}{d}{d}{W}

This is a pre-defined list of serial keys. One key per line. The list will be automatically updated as keys are sold. Keys from orders that have been refunded are NOT automatically re-added.

Please note that it is your responsibility to ensure this list has enough keys to meet demand. If there is only one key remaining, and two people place orders within a short period of time, it is possible payment is taken from both customers but the slower order will not have a valid serial key to assign to the customer.
The administrator has not completed set up of the eCommerce system. The forum's business details must be filled out in the administrator options, under "Invoice Options".

The shipping cost may change based on how many other items you are purchasing and what shipping method you choose for each item.
The costs displayed here are estimates. The final shipping cost will be displayed on the checkout page once you have chosen a shipping method for all your items.
A short description that will be displayed above the main product information.

A short description that will be included in the email notifications regarding this sale.
It is not needed to include start/end information, as this will be automatically added to the email.
Whether this field can be searched in the "Filters" drop-down.
Stop notification emails for expiring licenses
Stop notification emails from all products
The user name of the user who should be logged as the executor of the store credit if no user is logged.
Use negative values for store credit used, or positive values for store credit earned.
Enter an IP address to see a list of all store credit usages logged as having originated from that IP. You may enter a partial IP address such as 192.168.*, 192.168.0.0/16, or 2001:db8::/32.
The system has not been configured correctly: no valid payment profile selected. Please contact us and notify the administration of this problem.

This product type only needs one variation for pricing purposes. You can add more if you want, but it's strongly recommended to only add one variation.
This user has no commissions to display.

This will reset the expiry date of expired licenses to the current time, then apply the above extension.
Leave unticked and the extension will always be applied to the license's current expiry date, regardless of what it is.
The chosen update duration is not valid for this product.

If this option is enabled, the user's current IP address will be compared to the country they chose in their billing address during checkout.
The order will be halted if the countries do not match.

The value represents the internal value for the filter. The text field is shown when the selection is displayed. You should not change the value field if you have saved any filtering options; if you do, those associations will be deleted.

The value represents the internal value for the version. The text field is shown when the selection is displayed. You should not change the value field if any users have downloaded this product; if you do, old log entries will display invalid data.
If you have a valid VAT registration number (VRN), enter it here.
Your VAT ID is awaiting approval before the tax status can be applied.

If you provide a VAT ID and your business is registered outside of {country}, we don't need to charge VAT on your order.
Please enter your VAT ID without spaces.

Please do not reply to this message. You must visit the forum to reply.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the category "{category}" at {board} with email notification of new products or updates.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this category or disable all emails.
{author} created a product within a category you are watching at {board}.
{author} updated a product within a category you are watching at {board}.

Please do not reply to this message.

This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the product "{product}" at {board} with email notification of updates.

If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this product or disable all emails.
{author} updated a product you are watching at {board}.
WkHtmlToPdf version 0.12.5 or above is required.
{name} has not posted any products yet.
{name} has not purchased any licenses yet.

{name} reacted to your update to product {title} with {reaction}.

Enable "Checkout" button on the product page
Send expiry reminder for licenses that expire in less than...
Send email reminders for pending orders older than...
Require a review when rating products
Enable separate "Digital download refund policy" checkbox
Add-on product licenses can display the parent product in the title, controllable with this setting.
Your business' resident country. The native name of the country will be printed on the invoice.
If enabled, users can choose to make their reviews anonymous. Staff will still be able to see who made the review, but end users will not.

If you are using the API to return licenses, you may wish to filter the licenses based on a URL entered in a license field. If so, please enter its field ID here.
This field will be checked against the HTTP_X_DRAGONBYTE_BOARDURL header when fetching the list of licenses.

If enabled, the value entered in the above license field must match the passed URL exactly. Otherwise, only the "host" part needs to match.
Example: (enabled) https://www.example.com vs. (disabled) example.com

This feature automatically rounds prices up to the nearest 0, 2.50, 4.95 or 9.95.

Note: Only affects automatic calculations.
This system allows you to control whether invoices are automatically sent to users after they complete a transaction.
First line of the business address.
Second line of the business address.
Third line of the business address.
Fourth line of the business address.
If your business address has a c/o, you can add it here.
If your business has a tax ID such as VAT, enter it here.
The title of your business to be printed on the invoice.

The email address DragonByte eCommerce will accept purchase confirmation requests to.
This should be an account that is not used for anything other than confirmation mail. Using a personal email account WILL lead to data loss!
When content is deleted, take this action with any automatically created thread.
This setting lets you choose the currency all prices should be displayed in.
The default "Customers" user group for new purchases. This can be overridden on a per-product basis.
When a user adds a new address, this will be the default country selected.
This setting controls who should own products created in the AdminCP. Ideally this should be set to a "bot" user that no-one logs in to.
The number of downloads that will be listed per page in the "Releases" tab.

This setting lets you toggle the API system that lets third party sites connect to your store.

An API key will be automatically generated that allows users to view products, downloads and their own licenses.
If enabled, a "Checkout" button will appear under the Purchase button in the Pricing information if the current product is added to the cart.

If yes, the system will start collecting and checking confirmation emails.
Requires the below IMAP settings filled out with an account that is not used for anything other than confirmation mail. Using a personal email account WILL lead to data loss!
If selected, the income graph will be added to the statistics block on the admin home page.
If disabled, the entire product rating system will be disabled.

This is the discount (in percent) that will be applied to purchases if the license has expired.
For instance: If a license expired Feb 1st, and it is being renewed on Feb 10th, this discount will apply.

You can set the template to be used for generated .zip files here.
Available replacement variables: {title}, {license_key}

If your system supports it, you can use a HTML template to generate invoices. To use this feature, you must have wkhtmltopdf installed on your server.

Enter the path to the wkhtmltopdf binary on this server. You can sometimes find this with the command which wkhtmltopdf.
This lets you turn off the invoicing system, preventing users from receiving or downloading invoices for their purchases.
You shouldn't change this unless you need to.
This should not be changed unless you are sure you need to.
The style selected here will be used to render all invoices instead of the default style.
When viewing the product index or category overview pages, this will be the default order for products.
The number of log entries that will be listed per page across the store.

The maximum discount (in percent) that can be applied to a product.
100 = No limit

In order to keep your geolocation database up to date, you need to sign up for an account and set a password, then generate a license key and fill that out here.
Geolocation is used for validating a customer's location if they fill out a VAT ID with their billing address.
This setting has no effect if a review is not required and the user does not enter a review.
When viewing the account overview page, this will be the default order for orders.
The number of orders that will be listed per page in a user's account.
You can choose the available payment profile(s) here.
Non-license products can display the product variation in the order item title, controllable with this setting.
The maximum allowed dimensions for product icon images (width x height). Use 0 or blank to use default dimensions.
The number of products that will be listed per page across the store.

You can set the template to be used for new release threads here.
Available replacement variables: {title}, {category}, {starting_price}

This is the discount (in percent) that will be applied to purchases if the license is still active.
For instance: If a license expires Feb 1st, but it is being renewed on Jan 30th, this discount will apply.

If disabled, guests will be asked for their email address when entering their address details instead of being asked to register or login.

This setting has no effect if a digital product is in a guest's cart. Digital products always require an account.

If selected, users may only rate a product once they have downloaded it.
This setting is ignored for physical products.
If enabled, users must submit a review when rating a product.

This controls whether visitors can vote on whether a product review is helpful. This can allow more helpful reviews to become more visible. If enabled, you may choose to limit voting to positive responses only (upvotes). Product authors will not be able to vote on reviews for their own products.
The number of reviews that will be listed per page across the store.

During checkout, users will be asked to confirm they have read the Terms of Service. If your local laws require explicit consent for the refund policy regarding digital downloads, you can enable this setting.

To customise the wording of the refund policy, change the phrase dbtech_ecommerce_i_agree_to_refund_policy
When someone purchases a physical item, the email can be sent to the seller or to the forum's contact email address.
For physical items, this is the unit of measurement that will be displayed when showing the item's weight.

If a page is selected here, the contents of this page will be displayed in a scrollable area before purchase / download.
Updating this page in the AdminCP will force users to accept the Terms of Service again.
Configure shopping cart for other users
Submit new VAT address without approval
Manage tags by others in own product
Only require click after X pages
List recent releases on license page
Show product owner on overview list
Toggles whether infinite scrolling is enabled for this style.
Definition of the ribbon that will be shown when a product is featured.
The border that gives the "wrap around" effect.

If you want to require click only after a certain amount of pages have loaded, set this here.
0 = Always require click
Controls whether loading the next page happens automatically, or upon pressing a button.
If selected, new pages loaded will also update the browser's history.
The background wrapper for the invoice itself.
The header row contains your logo and sits at the top of the first page of the invoice.
The main page wrapper inside the <body> tag.
Toggles whether the list of recent releases is enabled in the license area for this style.
This only affects the category view and the main home page overview.
The color of the rating circle bar.
The width of the bar in the product rating circle
The background color for the product rating circle's bar.
Toggles how a product's rating appears in the sidebar on the product information page.
Definition of the ribbon that will be shown when a product is on sale.
The border that gives the "wrap around" effect.
Various style properties for DragonByte eCommerce
Displays the most recently updated products.
Displays inside the side navigation on the product category pages. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current category entity in the {$context.category} param.
Displays inside the side navigation on the product overview page.
Displays inside the sidebar on the product page. Widget templates rendered in this position can use the current product entity in the {$context.product} param.
